Name: VHIL_N600_VehFunc_IdleCtrtlr_0DegCCoolant_Neutral
Test Case Description: To Monitor whether engine speed is within the idle controller range during zero deg C coolant temperature, neutral gear and accelerator pedal value is zero
Pre-Action:
1. Set Battery Voltage to 13.5V
2. Turn Ignition ON.[Ignition_SW_IP= 1]
3. Crank the vehicle[ES_SW_IP=1]
4. No CAN failure & Idle Controller related failure should not be present
Test Steps.Action:
1.Simulate Gear_Position_Sensor_IP = Neutral [GEAR_POSITION[0x150] =  0x2]
2.Simulate ACC_PEDAL_IP = 0%(No action in Accelerator pedal Position) to acheive [ENGINE_RPM[0x150] >= 1350 RPM]
3.Simulate ACC_PEDAL_IP = 0%(No action in Accelerator pedal Position) to achieve DISPLAY_SPEED[0x120] ~= 0 kmph
4.Simulate [Engine_Temperature_Sensor_IP];COOLANT_TEMPERATURE(0x350) = 0 deg C
 4.1 EMS should publish ENGINE_RPM(0x150) = within 1350 to 1500 RPM
 4.2 EMS should publish ENGINE_STATUS(0x151) = 0x0 (Running)
 4.3 EMS should publish HANDLE_GRIP_OPEN_PERCENTAGE_1 (0X150)= 0
 4.4 EMS should publish HANDLE_GRIP_OPEN_PERCENTAGE_2 (0X175)= 0
 4.5 Cluster should display Neutral gear, Speed 0 kmph and within 1350 to 1500 RPM
Post-Action:
1. Turn Ignition OFF.[Ignition_SW_IP=0]. 
2.Set Battery Voltage to V

Name: VHIL_N600_VehFunc_IdleCtrtlr_0DegCCoolant_Neutral_Accpedal_SCFault
Test Case Description: To Monitor whether engine speed is within the idle controller range during zero deg C coolant temperature, neutral gear,short circuit accelerator pedal
Pre-Action:
1. Set Battery Voltage to 13.5V
2. Turn Ignition ON.[Ignition_SW_IP= 1]
3. Crank the vehicle[ES_SW_IP=1]
4. No CAN failure & Idle Controller related failure should not be present
Test Steps.Action:
1.Simulate Gear_Position_Sensor_IP = Neutral [GEAR_POSITION[0x150] =  0x2]
2.Simulate ACC_PEDAL_IP = 0%(No action in Accelerator pedal Position) to acheive [ENGINE_RPM[0x150] >= 1350 RPM]
3.Simulate ACC_PEDAL_IP = 0%(No action in Accelerator pedal Position) to achieve DISPLAY_SPEED[0x120] ~= 0x1FFF[Signal invalid]
4.Simulate [Engine_Temperature_Sensor_IP];COOLANT_TEMPERATURE(0x350) = 0 deg C
 4.1 EMS should publish ENGINE_RPM(0x150) = within 1350 to 1500 RPM
 4.2 EMS should publish ENGINE_STATUS(0x151) = 0x0 (Running)
 4.3 EMS should publish HANDLE_GRIP_OPEN_PERCENTAGE_1 (0X150)= 0xFF(Signal Invalid)
 4.4 EMS should publish HANDLE_GRIP_OPEN_PERCENTAGE_2 (0X175)= 0xFF(Signal Invalid)
 4.5 Cluster should display Neutral gear, Speed "--" kmph and within 1350 to 1500 RPM
Post-Action:
1. Turn Ignition OFF.[Ignition_SW_IP=0]. 
2.Set Battery Voltage to V

Name: VHIL_N600_VehFunc_IdleCtrtlr_ClutchPressed_GearOtherthanNeutral
Test Case Description: To Monitor whether engine speed is coming to idle controller when clutch is pressed with vehicle running in gear other than neutral
Pre-Action:
1. Set Battery Voltage to 13.5V
2. Turn Ignition ON.[Ignition_SW_IP= 1]
3. Crank the vehicle[ES_SW_IP=1]
4. No CAN failure & Idle Controller related failure should not be present
Test Steps.Action:
1.Simulate Gear_Position_Sensor_IP = 4th [GEAR_POSITION[0x150] =  0x8]
2.Simulate ACC_PEDAL_IP = 40%(No action in Accelerator pedal Position) to acheive [ENGINE_RPM[0x150] ~= 6400 RPM]
3.Simulate ACC_PEDAL_IP = 40%(No action in Accelerator pedal Position) to achieve DISPLAY_SPEED[0x120] ~= 70 kmph
4.Simulate [Engine_Temperature_Sensor_IP];COOLANT_TEMPERATURE(0x350) = 100 deg C
5.Simulate Clutch_SW_IP = 1 [Clutch pressed = pressed]
 5.1 EMS should publish ENGINE_RPM(0x150) = within 1350 to 1500 RPM
 5.2 EMS should publish ENGINE_STATUS(0x151) = 0x0 (Running)
 5.3 EMS should publish HANDLE_GRIP_OPEN_PERCENTAGE_1 (0X150)= 40
 5.4 EMS should publish HANDLE_GRIP_OPEN_PERCENTAGE_2 (0X175)= 40
 5.5 EMS should publish CLUTCH_STATUS(0x150) =  0x1 (Clutch pressed)
 5.6 Cluster should display 4th gear, Speed will be decresed slowly 70 kmph to 60kmph  and within 1350 to 1500 RPM
Post-Action:
1. Turn Ignition OFF.[Ignition_SW_IP=0]. 
2.Set Battery Voltage to V

Name: VHIL_N600_VehFunc_IdleCtrtlr_IgnCycles_transitions
Test Case Description: To observe the Idle Controller functionality with ignition cycle transitions
Pre-Action:
1. Set Battery Voltage to 13.5V
2. Turn Ignition ON.[Ignition_SW_IP= 1]
3. Crank the vehicle[ES_SW_IP=1]
4. No CAN failure & Idle Controller related failure should not be present
5. Simulate Gear_Position_Sensor_IP = Neutral [GEAR_POSITION[0x150] =  0x2]
6. Simulate ACC_PEDAL_IP = 0% to achieve DISPLAY_SPEED[0x120] = 0kmph
Test Steps.Action:
1.Simulate Gear_Position_Sensor_IP = Neutral [GEAR_POSITION[0x150] =  0x2]
2.Simulate ACC_PEDAL_IP = 0%(No action in Accelerator pedal Position) to acheive [ENGINE_RPM[0x150] >= 1350 RPM]
3.Simulate ACC_PEDAL_IP = 0%(No action in Accelerator pedal Position) to achieve DISPLAY_SPEED[0x120] ~= 0 kmph
4.Simulate [Engine_Temperature_Sensor_IP];COOLANT_TEMPERATURE(0x350) = 0 deg C
 4.1 EMS should publish ENGINE_RPM(0x150) = within 1350 to 1500 RPM
 4.2 EMS should publish ENGINE_STATUS(0x151) = 0x0 (Running)
 4.3 EMS should publish HANDLE_GRIP_OPEN_PERCENTAGE_1 (0X150)= 0
 4.4 EMS should publish HANDLE_GRIP_OPEN_PERCENTAGE_2 (0X175)= 0
 4.5 Cluster should display Neutral gear, Speed 0 kmph and within 1350 to 1500 RPM
5. Turn Ignition OFF.[Ignition_SW_IP= 0]
 5.1 EMS and cluster system will go OFF
6. Turn Ignition ON.[Ignition_SW_IP= 1]
 6.1 EMS should publish ENGINE_RPM(0x150) = 0 RPM
 6.2 EMS should publish ENGINE_STATUS(0x151) =  0x2 (Stalled)
 6.3 EMS should publish HANDLE_GRIP_OPEN_PERCENTAGE_1 (0X150)= 0
 6.4 EMS should publish HANDLE_GRIP_OPEN_PERCENTAGE_2 (0X175)= 0
 6.5 Cluster should display Neutral gear, Speed 0 kmph and 0 RPM
Post-Action:
1. Turn Ignition OFF.[Ignition_SW_IP=0]. 
2.Set Battery Voltage to V

Name: VHIL_N600_VehFunc_IdleCtrtlr_IgnCycles_transitions_MultiCycles

 4.4 EMS should publish HANDLE_GRIP_OPEN_PERCENTAGE_2 (0X175)= 0

 7.1 EMS and cluster system will go OFF
8. Turn Ignition ON.[Ignition_SW_IP= 1]
 8.1 EMS should publish ENGINE_RPM(0x150) = 0 RPM

9. Turn Ignition OFF.[Ignition_SW_IP= 0]
 9.1 EMS and cluster system will go OFF
10. Turn Ignition ON.[Ignition_SW_IP= 1]
 10.1 EMS should publish ENGINE_RPM(0x150) = 0 RPM
 10.2 EMS should publish ENGINE_STATUS(0x151) =  0x2 (Stalled)
 10.3 EMS should publish HANDLE_GRIP_OPEN_PERCENTAGE_1 (0X150)= 0
 10.4 EMS should publish HANDLE_GRIP_OPEN_PERCENTAGE_2 (0X175)= 0
